active.description: whether the alert is active (can be triggered). Defaults to true.

attributes.description: A hash of additional attribtues for the alert. Attributes documented below.

condition.description: A trigger condition for the alert. Conditions documented below.

rearm_seconds.description: minimum amount of time between sending alert notifications, in seconds.

attributes.description: The attributes hash configures specific components of a metricâ€™s visualization.

composite.description: The definition of the composite metric.

description.description: Text that can be used to explain precisely what the metric is measuring.

display_name.description: The name which will be used for the metric when viewing the Metrics website.

name.description: The unique identifier of the metric.

period.description: Number of seconds that is the standard reporting period of the metric.

type.description: The type of metric to create (gauge, counter, or composite).

settings.description: a JSON hash of settings specific to the alert type.

max.description: The maximum display value of the chart's Y-axis.

min.description: The minimum display value of the chart's Y-axis.

name.description: The title of the chart when it is displayed.

related_space.description: The ID of another space to which this chart is

space_id.description: The ID of the space this chart should be in.

stream.description: Nested block describing a metric to use for data in the
